alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 03 at 10:34PM MST until March 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical fire weather conditions possible across portions of the area on Sunday, mainly south of Interstate 70... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 013, 027, 028, 041, 042, AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman, Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace, Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan, Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
